resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ex eorum enim scriptis et institutis cum omnis doctrina liberalis, omnis historia. Haec dicuntur inconstantissime. Ut in voluptate sit, qui epuletur, in dolore, qui torqueatur. Hoc etsi multimodis reprehendi potest, tamen accipio, quod dant. Non dolere, inquam, istud quam vim habeat postea videro.
Refresh all app data such as Surat Names, Aayat Count etc.
• Quran files based on the images used for printing the Quran at Raqeem Ahmadiyya Press, Ojokoro, Lagos. \n\n • Surah List and Details: "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_surahs_in_the_Quran"
